mapper.select: SELECT * FROM produce_plan ORDER BY plan_no DESC
SELECT 'PLAN_'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'rrrr')||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(plan_no,-4)),0)+1,4,0) as plan_no FROM produce_plan WHERE plan_no LIKE 'PLAN_'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'rrrr')||'%'

SELECT p.plan_no, p.plan_quantity, p.plan_start, p.plan_end, p.plan_ex, p.plan_product_no, p.plan_bom_no, p.plan_order_no, b.bom_quantity, g.goods_name, g.goods_standard, g.goods_contents, g.goods_check, g.goods_date FROM produce_plan p
JOIN produce_bom b ON p.plan_bom_no = b.bom_no
JOIN produce_goods g ON p.plan_product_no = g.goods_no
WHERE p.plan_no = #{planNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO produce_plan ( plan_no, plan_quantity, plan_start, plan_end, plan_ex, plan_product_no, plan_bom_no, plan_order_no ) VALUES( #{planNo}, #{planQuantity}, #{planStart}, #{planEnd}, #{planEx}, #{planProductNo}, #{planBomNo}, #{planOrderNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT goods_no FROM produce_goods ORDER BY goods_no
SELECT bom_no FROM produce_bom ORDER BY bom_no

SELECT o.order_no, o.goods_no, o.order_date, o.delivery_date, o.total_num, o.note, g.goods_name, b.bom_no, code_name as order_progress_code FROM produce_goods g JOIN orders o ON g.goods_no = o.goods_no JOIN produce_bom b ON g.goods_no = b.bom_product_no JOIN code ON o.order_progress_code = code.code_no WHERE o.order_progress_code = 'B0101'
